name: S class Heroine
about:
‚ñ∂Esperia Kingdom's poster‚óÄ
We invite precious adventurers to our humble game.

‚ñ† A helpful story when read
The Last Princess Ella who revived with the pendant. And the lost colleagues.
Of course, we'll be able to meet them again! Ella another universe!
Interact with Ella from another dimension, meet precious colleagues, and become the strongest!
Today, April 28, 390, I, Princess Ella, starts another adventure.
Raise your own S-rank female character in the multiverse world!

‚ñ† Features of raising an S-class female character!
- Advocating for infinite growth of idle game
- A high-quality RPG that will ease your eyes tired from low-quality games.
- The pleasure of breakthrough action and the fun of farming a torrent of items
- How many avatars are you raising? Choose how many to raise according to your taste
- A solid RPG with many things that are there and not many things that are not there.

‚ñ†Interact with various avatars! Enjoy your new skills!
You can acquire unique avatars through missions?!
Each avatar has brilliant skills, equipment, and even explosive growth!

‚ñ†Breakthrough action that breaks through enemies without hesitation!
Breakthrough! Onwards! Pleasure! Action!
Grow endlessly with refreshing sense of action!

‚ñ†Become stronger by exploring dungeons!
Unique dungeons! Various growth rewards!
Defeat monsters with my own strategies!

‚ñ†Gather charming colleagues and form an S-class party!
If you work with your colleagues, your abilities will grow quickly!
Team up with colleagues who fit your unique avatar! Find the strongest avatar combination!

‚óà YOUTUBE ‚óà
https://www.youtube.com/c/DAERISOFT

‚óàAccess rights guidance‚óà
[Selective access rights]
Camera: Required for photo and video uploads.
Photos/media/file: Required to save images, upload photos and videos.
* You can use the service even if you do not agree to grant of access.

‚óà Support Specifications ‚óà
Resolution: All devices supported, including Galaxy Fold 3
RAM: 3 GB or more
Capacity: At least 300 MB of free space
OS: Android 10 or higher recommended

name: Harvest Town
about:
Harvest Town is a simulation mobile game with pixel style. It has high freedom and gathers various RPG elements to create a real and fascinating rural life.
# Features
„ÄêBuild Farmhouse„ÄëClear weeds, clip tree branches, decorate your own cottages.
„ÄêDiverse Species„ÄëRaise your own livestock, including chickens, ducks, cattle, sheep and horses, etc. You can also adopt adorable cats and dogs, and experience a real immersive farm life.
„ÄêFree Exploration„Äë A variety of fresh gameplay: mysterious cave adventure, unlocking the treasure box with a password, and a variety of Easter eggs which has yet to explore.
„ÄêAbundant Story„ÄëEvery NPC with a prominent personality will give you an unforgettable, fantastic and dramatic experience. Select an attractive NPC you like and pull together to walk into the marriage hall.
„ÄêInteractive Gameplay„Äë Interact with other players, such as online multiplayer racing, market trading, and create a real online player interactive platform.
„ÄêChange of Four Seasons„Äë Mild spring, hot summer, nostalgic fall and cold winter. Experience the changes of four season and decorate your small town.
„ÄêField Collection„Äë There are surprises everywhere in the town, such as wood and fruit. Create DIYs and build your own town.

Harvest Town is more than just a simulation game, we endowed more elements into the game, such as RPG, Puzzle, and interactions!
Harvest town is gray before meeting you, please use your hands to color the town now!

# Contact us
If you have any suggestions and issues,you may contact us.
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/HarvestTown7/
Email:ht@httwin.com

name: Sink Monster: Merge War
about:
Welcome to the exciting journey into the world of Sink Monster: Merge War, where war meets sink! Get ready for an addictive gaming experience that combines strategic battles, hilarious merges, and the fun of a sink and kamera-themed universe.
In this unique game, you'll become a master of the bathroom realm, leading a squad of scooby in a war against monsters. Your goal? Dominate the battlefield, merge your monster sink, and win the war!
The key to success lies in merging and evolving your scooby, creating powerful forces capable of overcoming any enemies. Just combine the same sink or kamera to unlock higher-level warriors, boosting their attack power and unlocking special abilities. And you can be the master of merging with just a touch of your finger.

How to play Sink Monster: Merge War:
üîÑ Merge scooby monster to create powerful monsters and unlock higher levels.
üéØ Strategically deploy monsters on the battlefield for maximum power.
‚öîÔ∏è Tap to launch powerful attacks and engage in thrilling scooby battle.
üîù Upgrade and evolve your scooby monster to unlock new abilities and stats.
üåü Unlock new maps by progressing through the game's challenges.

Special features of the fusion game:
üé® Vibrant visuals and amusing universe.
üîä Funny sound effects that make you laugh.
üéÆ Easy-to-play gameplay suitable for players of all skill levels.
üí• Strategic battles that require tactical planning and timing.
üèÜ Special rewards, upgrades, and new arena to be unlocked.

Are you ready for the challenge? Prepare for an ultimate clash, merge your way to victory, and become the unrivaled master of Sink Monster: Merge War!
Unleash the ultimate sink kamera war! Merge, attack, conquer to master the merge game

name: Card Guardians: Rogue Deck RPG
about:
Welcome to the world of Valentia! Experience thrilling card battles in a roguelike deck building style.


Build your deck and become a legendary hero in Middle Earth. Defeat sinister monsters with strategic card choices and master the chaos!

üÉè
Valentia, once a peaceful realm, is now plagued by the forces of Chaos. As a skilled card battler, your mission is to construct the ultimate RPG deck and overcome challenging single-player roguelike battles.

Prepare to face daunting monsters and enemies in this strategic roguelike card wars game. It's more than just a rogue battle; it's a test of your courage and skill. Are you ready for adventure time?

Valentia's monsters and enemies await you! Choose a strategic deck of cards to battle these beings dominated by the forces of darkness. This journey will require a lot of strategy and, of course, courage. Be very careful, this Roguelike Card Wars game is much more than a simple rogue card battle game. Be ready for this adventure time!

üîÆ
Liberate Valentia from darkness by assembling a powerful deck. Strategically choose ccg cards to defeat foes controlled by Chaos Magic. Your journey will lead you to discover new roguelike cards for your deck-building arsenal. Remember, victory depends on your cunning strategy and conquering RPG deck-building skills. Prepare for an epic adventure time card wars !

You will have to explore the realms and find new roguelike cards for your deck building and to use in your epic battles. And remember, as with every ccg cards game, your strategy is very important, you will only win the battles using and conquering your best RPG deck building. Are you ready for this adventure time card wars?

‚öîÔ∏è
Embark on this RPG collectible cards game and choose your hero. Challenge your opponents in intense roguelike cards games and become the greatest RPG deck builder in Valentia!

Each hero possesses unique powers, and more heroes await as you explore the realms. This roguelike adventure time will test your mettle, demanding an impressive RPG CCG deck and a mastery of roguelike card battles. Are you up for the challenge?

‚ú®
In this roguelike card battle game, success depends on your deck. With each level, you'll unlock new RPG collectible card wars to build your strategy and engage in thrilling battles.

As a hero, your focus is on deck building, ccg trading cards, and crafting powerful strategies to overcome creatures controlled by Chaos Magic.

üåé
Uncover the secrets of Valentia by exploring dungeons, castles, forests, and deserts. Collect ccg cards, earn rewards, and prove your strategic prowess. Only true strategists can conquer these roguelike challenging games.

In each part of the kingdom, you'll encounter unique species under Chaos Magic's control. Defeat them to acquire essential RPG collectible cards for your deck and discover the best equipment for roguelike cards battles.

Card Guardians is a free RPG collectible card wars game by Tapps Games. Optional in-game purchases offer additional features and items to enhance your gameplay.

name: TIC TAC TOE-Puzzles all in one
about:
Welcome to our collection of puzzle and relaxation games! This game is a collection of games designed to challenge your intelligence, exercise your thinking skills, and at the same time make you feel happy and relaxed. Whether you want to kill time in your spare time, relieve stress, or are looking for a way to exercise your brain, this collection of puzzle games will be your best choice.

Special feature:
1. Diverse game types: Our collection of puzzle games covers a variety of types, including math questions, word puzzles, mazes, puzzles, etc. No matter what type of intellectual challenge you're interested in, you'll find a game for you here.
Our existing puzzle games include:
-Tic Tac Toe
-Block Black
-Bubble Shooter
-Block Escape
-Sliding Block
-Hex Puzzle
-Sudoku
-Connect The Dot
-Water Sort
-Block Tower
-Match 3D
-Find the Difference
2. Levels with increasing difficulty: Each level in the game is designed with increasing difficulty, so that you can gradually improve your intelligence and problem-solving abilities. From beginner to advanced, challenge levels of different difficulty levels to keep your brain active at all times.
3. Personalized gaming experience: We consider that everyone has different gaming preferences, so we provide personalized gaming experience options for each player. You can choose the theme, background music and interface style of the game according to your own preferences to ensure you get the most fun and relaxation in the game.
4. Rankings and Achievement System: Our game collection features global rankings and personal achievement systems, allowing you to compete with other players and show off your intelligence and gaming skills. By participating in challenges and completing achievements, you will earn honors and rewards and build your reputation in the game.
5. Daily tasks and rewards: Our daily updated task system will give you new challenges, and you will receive generous rewards after completing the tasks. This will not only help you maintain your interest in the game, but also inspire you to continue to challenge yourself and pursue higher gaming achievements.
Whether you are a child or an adult, whether you are a beginner or an intellectual expert, this collection of puzzle and leisure decompression games will become a good companion for your leisure and entertainment. Are you up for the challenge? Come download our game, let intelligence and relaxation coexist, and enjoy a wonderful gaming experience!
